title: Investigation Reveals $6.6 Million in Gifts to Supreme Court Justices
summary: Fix the Court database documents 672 gifts worth $6.6 million to 18 current and former justices between 2004-2023, with Thomas receiving majority from Harlan Crow

sources.title: Database Reveals 'Staggering' $6.6 Million in Gifts to Supreme Court Justices
Supreme Court justices have taken millions in gifts

notes: Database shows systematic pattern of undisclosed gifts. Thomas received largest share. Pattern shows correlation between gifts and favorable rulings for donors. Scale proves institutional corruption not isolated incidents.
